constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 36 (Thursday, February 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 1320.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 3 and 18 of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H730]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

policyArea.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

title: Juneteenth National Independence Day Act
